author: liyin
msg: [master] Use the local file system in the single node template
The single node setup is meant for spinning up a single-node cluster
instantly. Those who need it, should be fine with using the local file system
instead of HDFS, which seems like an overkill.
Test Plan: Started the cluster on my devbox, and it started fine.
